TextLang.Text: The Internet connection is disabled. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] and enable Internet connection.
A connection to the network could not be established. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] and check your settings.
There are too many media servers. Some media servers will not be displayed.
. ﻂﺋﺎﺳﻭ ﻡﺩاﻮﺧ ﯽﻠﻋ ﺭﻮﺜﻌﻟا ﻢﺘﻳ ﻢﻟ
An Ethernet cable is not connected.
